text:
I suggest that the fail tasks supports the unless attribute. This makes it 
possible to check for certain property and fail if the are not set. E.g. if
your project depends on a certain JDBC driver or XSLT processor and it is not 
present the build must fail.

I gave this bug the severity  "Major" as a workaround for this behaviou 
is rather cumbersome.

creator: boris@i3.informatik.rwth-aachen.de
